availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Meekey Lane Vertrees. Father of John Vertrees, Samuel Vertrees, Emily Benham Vertrees, Miles Vertrees, Isaac Vertrees, Squire Vertrees, James Vertrees, Scott Vertrees, Taylor Vertrees, and Alice Vertrees.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, [State], Meade County, stamped p. 171. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 32. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965 [database on-line]. Lehi, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2016.
